actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Constrict
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the snake can't constrict another target.
